mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO sys_role_oauth_client(role_id, client_id) VALUES (#{roleId}, #{clientId})
mapper.select:
SELECT client.* FROM sys_oauth_client_details AS client
INNER JOIN sys_role_oauth_client AS rc ON rc.client_id = client.id
WHERE
rc.role_id = #{roleId}
client.id NOT IN ( SELECT rc.client_id FROM sys_role_oauth_client AS rc WHERE rc.role_id = #{roleId} )
AND LOCATE(#{condition.clientId}, client.clientId) > 0
ORDER BY client.created_at ASC
